video.title: Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath
video.synopsis: Former Scientology members share detailed accounts of alleged abuse and harassment by the Church in this docuseries from actress Leah Remini.

episodes.synopsis: Former Sea Org member Valerie Haney shares her experiences in Scientology, including her dramatic escape and the last time she saw Shelly Miscavige.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Cierra Westerman recalls how she was recruited out of a Florida private investigator school to spy on critics of Scientology.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Leah leads a discussion about how the Church of Scientology formed an alliance with the Nation of Islam's Minister Louis Farrakhan.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: At Tom Cruise and Katie Holmes's 2006 wedding, Leah Remini asked what she thought was an innocent question: Where's Shelly Miscavige?
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Former member Bert Schippers, a major donor to one of the Church's Ideal Orgs, recounts his experiences and regrets.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: In this episode, Leah and Mike explore how members are encouraged to donate money to the church — even if it requires taking out loans.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Former high-ranking members of Scientology speak about the Church's Gold Base and the alleged abuses they suffered.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Witnesses recall how Scientology allegedly tried to discredit Clearwater's mayor after making the Florida town its headquarters.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: The 1995 death of prominent Scientologist Lisa McPherson sets off a battle over the testimony of the medical examiner who conducted the autopsy.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Leah and Mike speak with Jay Wexler, an expert in constitutional law, about Scientology's journey to tax-exempt status.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Filmed in front of a live studio audience, Leah and Mike listen to stories of how Scientology policies have hindered members from reporting abuses.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Leah and Mike meet with former members of the Jehovah's Witnesses to learn about their experiences in the organization.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: The emotional aftermath of leaving the Church of Scientology can have a lasting impact on ex-members trying to leave the past behind.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Ex-Scientologists Leah Remini and Mike Rinder meet with two women who were raised in the Church, where they say they were abused as children.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Leah and Mike spend time with Marie Bilheimer and Lauren Haggis, two former Scientology members who lost loved ones to suicide.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Liz Gale, a third-generation Scientologist, speaks about how her parents met in the Church and how her brother's incredible potential was dashed.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: To explain the concept of Scientology's "Bridge to Total Freedom," Leah and Mike sit down for a discussion with former Church members.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Leah and Mike chat with John Brousseau, a former Sea Org member, who witnessed David Miscavige's rise to power within the Church.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Oscar-winning filmmaker Paul Haggis discusses what inspired him to break from the Church. Also, a former recruiter speaks about Tom Cruise's impact.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Leah and Mike speak with ex-members about their childhood experiences at Scientology's educational camps for troubled kids.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Two ex-members speak about being abandoned as children. Also, Leah and Mike discuss the Sea Org, an elite group within Scientology.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Leah and Mike explain how Scientology members seeking to advance to "Clear" may face financial hardship along the way.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Leah sits down with two of her close childhood friends for an emotional conversation about their shared experiences growing up in Scientology.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Several former members profiled in previous episodes, including Chantal Dodson, return to discuss how appearing on the show impacted their lives.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: This episode shows how the leaders of Scientology rely on public relations groups to ensure the Church maintains a positive image in the public eye.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Leah and Mike discuss the life and legacy of L. Ron Hubbard, the enigmatic founder of Scientology, who died in 1986.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Leah and Mike answer viewer questions about the second season of "Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath."
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Leah Remini delves into allegations of abuse, heartbreak and harassment experienced by those who have left Scientology.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Leah visits the spiritual headquarters of Scientology in Clearwater, Florida to hear from Mike Rinder, a former high-ranking executive in the Church.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Leah discusses the sizable financial investment asked of members to advance along the Church's "Bridge to Total Freedom."
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: In this episode, Leah and Mike answer and discuss questions about Scientology via an Ask Me Anything  (AMA) session on Reddit.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: After the death of founder L. Ron Hubbard, David Miscavige emerges as the leader of the Church of Scientology.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: A lot goes into putting on a Scientology event. Leah and Mike speak to ex-member Marc Headley, who used to help produce these galas.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Former member Aaron Smith-Levin, once considered one of Scientology's top spiritual counselors, speaks about growing up in the Church.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: After Leah receives a letter from the Church accusing her of provoking hate crimes, she meets with the man the Church claims she incited.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Leah and Mike sit down with Scientology's most vocal critics to discuss how the Church deals with people who speak out.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: During their second online Q&A session, Leah and Mike discuss Scientology's use of celebrities, its stance on homosexuality and more.
episodes.title: Episode 10
